original_title: Cliff Richard and the Shadows : Thank You Very Much
overview: For two weeks in March 1978 Cliff Richard and The Shadows were reunited on stage for the first time in ten years. On the stage of the London Palladium they recreated the special magic of their twenty year musical history.
tagline: Reunion concert at the London Palladium
title: Cliff Richard and the Shadows : Thank You Very Much
